long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract the users who have liked a LinkedIn post, with the user's company, school and more details.
Automatically extract thanks to scraping all the LinkedIn users who liked a list of posts or articles.
